learning

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A data point for machine learning.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point(double[] weights)
      Produces a random point with each of two attributes (after the initial 1) randomly in [0.0, 0.1).
      Point(double[] attributes, int classification)
      Produces a point with the specified attributes and classification.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] getAttributes()
      Returns the atttributes of this point, including the bias attribute 1 at index 0.
      int getClassification()
      Returns the classification of this point (1 ot -1).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point

        public Point(double[] weights)
        Produces a random point with each of two attributes (after the initial 1) randomly in [0.0, 0.1). The classification is determined by a perceptron with weights.

      • Point

        public Point(double[] attributes,
     int classification)
        Produces a point with the specified attributes and classification. The attribute vector is augmented by adding a 1 at the beginning.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        public double[] getAttributes()
        Returns the atttributes of this point, including the bias attribute 1 at index 0.

      • getClassification

        public int getClassification()
        Returns the classification of this point (1 ot -1).
